FontsAddict Font Usage Example

Instructions:

  • 1Copy the font files and CSS files to your website's CSS folder.

  • 2Add the CSS html code to your website's html header.
    <head>
    ...
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="your_website_domain/css_dir/cadeoleo.css">
    ...
    </head>

  • 3Use the icon class on "display:inline" elements:
    Usage example: <i class="cadeoleo-lion"></i> or <span class="cadeoleo-lion"></span>

.cadeoleo-lion
.cadeoleo-lion-1
.cadeoleo-heart
.cadeoleo-lion-2
.cadeoleo-the
.cadeoleo-singapore
.cadeoleo-lion-3
.cadeoleo-baby
.cadeoleo-baby-1
.cadeoleo-skate
.cadeoleo-baby-2
.cadeoleo-security
.cadeoleo-two
